name: Zombie Tower Shooter: Battle on the Tropic of Cancer
blurb: Zombie Tower Shooter is a hybrid first-person shooter, real-time strategy game, featuring zombies in tattoo inspired art and designs

rewards.reward: No Reward

Collectable trading card:\r\nA trading card featuring artwork created by the artist behind the video game, and marked for play as part of a collectable card game.\r\n(more cards to come as concepts and artwork develop)

Rare collectable trading card:\r\nA more powerful and feature packed \u2018rare\u2019 card from our collectable card game, based on the characters and enemies from the video game. A \u2018rare\u2019 card is printed on higher quality stock, with multiple print passes, making it more expensive, and thus \u2018rare\u2019, rare cards are printed at less frequency then other card classes.

Booster Pack of Cards:\r\nContaining a total of 15 cards including all card classes, which are, in order on rarity, Hero, Villain, Rare, Uncommon, and common. A booster pack consists of; 10 commons, 3 un-commons, 1 rare card, and 1 hero or villain card.

Starter Pack:\r\nA full pack of collectable trading cards, based on the video game, complete with instructions for playing many types of card games, including co-op play style, one on one, and solitaire.

3D Printed Figure:\r\nA 3D print of a Collectable Trading Figure straight from the Video Game, These figures feature highly detailed 3d Sculptures designed by the artist behind the game, and are playable as a set, and are collectable as individuals.

3D Printed Figure Booster Pack:\r\nA set of five 3d printed figures, from the video game, complete with a play map and environment pieces, which can be combined with other play maps or pieces for extended play.\r\n( More pieces to be added as artwork and concepts develop )

Starter Set of 3D Printed Figures:\r\nA starter set of 3d printed figures containing two opposing factions, complete with a set of instructions for playing various game modes \r\n( More pieces to be added as artwork and concepts develop )

Full Length Original Soundtrack:\r\nThe first album containing the original soundtrack for the video game featuring all killer and no filler music themed from the Zombie Tower Shooter. The Zombie Tower Shooter OST also comes with a digital artbook\r\n(More Soundtrack Disks to be released as development continues)

Extended Edition of the Original Soundtrack:\r\nThis Version of the soundtrack features all of the tracks of the original soundtrack. The extended edition of the soundtrack includes bonus instrument versions of each track, additional remixes, demos, and out-takes. The extended version of the soundtrack also includes a voucher to download free singles, as well as DAW work files used to produce the soundtrack in various file formats.

Plastic Zombie Themed \u201cArmy Men\u201d like:\r\n3d prints of characters from the game in the form of the classic plastic 1/16 scale \u201cArmy Men\u201d action figures. Includes a set of 20 figures, 10 zombie forces and 10 non-zombie allies\r\n(More Pieces to come as artwork and concepts develop)
A anime style Chi-Bi Figurine:\r\nA super deformed anime style figurine from the game. Comes painted with accessories, and extra parts.

Paperback Art Book:\r\nThe first in a mini-series of books featuring artwork created by the many artists associated in the creation of the video game. The first book will be an introduction to the style, mood, and design of the world of the video game.\r\n(the art of the game will be presented In its entirety in the form of several books focusing on areas of art such as characters, environments, concepts, etc.; )

Custom Smartphone Controlled "Tank-bot":\r\nA small remote controlled vehicle, controlled through wi-fi via your mobile device and customized to look like a vehicle from the Zombie Tower Shooter video game equip with custom remote.\r\n( More designs will be offered as the game develops )

Action Pose Statue:\r\nA statue created and inspired from the events and characters  portrayed in the game. These Statues will come fully painted with extra parts and accessories, and will come with, a foil trading card, collectable miniature figure, and a mini poster of the character included.\r\n( More designs will be offered as the game develops )

Hard Cover Art Book:\r\nThe first in a mini-series of books featuring artwork created by the many artists associated in the creation of the video game. The first book will be an introduction to the style, mood, and design of the world of the video game.\r\n(the art of the game will be presented In its entirety in the form of several books focusing on areas of art such as characters, environments, concepts, etc.; )

Custom Silk Screen Kit:\r\nFeaturing screen printing equipment that you can use to make your own custom T-shirts, Jackets, and more! Featuring a custom pre-made screen, and instructional video, and all the necessary supplies for you to make your own custom stuff , featuring artwork from the artist behind the video game.

Encore Silk Screen Kit:\r\nA custom silk screen kit containing all the necessary supplies for you to make your own custom Zombie Tower Shooter gear with 2 different pre-made silk screens featuring artwork inspired by the video game. These pre-made silk screens will allow you to make countless custom items.

Own a Production Maquette:\r\nAn authentic, production ready, character maquette. A clay sculpture used for the production of 3D modeling and animation. Maquettes are scanned into a computer and transformed into 3D objects ready to be painted and animated, then put into the game.\r\n( Maquettes are produced on a need basis, and are limited in supply)
Custom Zombie Tower Shooter Mini Arcade*:\r\nDonate and receive your very own custom Mini Arcade, an arcade cabinet for a tablet, complete with custom graphics and buttons.
Custom All Star Guitar:\r\nThis package includes artwork and a custom 3D printed case fitted to an "All Start Guitar", detailed with custom artwork.

SkinJ Tattoo Art:\r\nReceive a skinj piece of art. Skinj art is artwork tattooed onto skin, and bonded to a frame for display, the skin is tanned and preserved for long term exposure. The skinj art pieces will be various sized and designs hand made with a frame, and hand tattooed with artwork from a professional tattoo artist.

Zombie Your Selves:\r\nYour and people of your choosing will be featured as zombies in a special personalized edition of the game. Your faces will be added in 3D to the zombie enemy units of the game.

Get your name in the game:\r\nThat\u2019s right, for one thousand dollars, you can have a supporting character in the game\u2019s story named after you. You will also receive a figure of your character, a key chain version of your character, as well as a personalized poster featuring your character.

Get A Tattoo By Jesse Lopez:\r\nHere is your one and only chance to get a tattoo from a really good, yet semi-retired tattoo artist. I can guarantee you will like what you get, and it will be the most well designed and well executed tattoo you ever had. Your Tattoo can be up to and including a whole body part, such as arm or leg, not a whole body tattoo, I will personally design and apply the tattoo myself.\r\n( Jesse Lopez is the guy who designed the game, fyi)

Get Yourself in print:\r\nGet an authentic canvas painting portraying a conflict between axis and ally forces, featuring you as either the hero or the villain. These paintings will be used to create posters for the video game.\r\n( You will also receive a free poster once the process is complete)
Get in the Game!!!:\r\nGet a character with your likeness in the game as a non-playable A.I. character in the universe of Zombie Tower Shooter, potentially seen by millions!

Game Developer COMPUTER:\r\nGet a computer custom built to high-end professional standards for developing games as an freelancer, this will be a powerful all-round computer made for creating and manipulating 3D and 2D game assets. Computers will come as laptops, with custom 3D printed components.

Game Developer Package:\r\nThis package comes with everything you need to produce video games on your own personal laptop computer, preloaded with all the software you need to make a game out of the box. The computer itself will come custom built to high-end professional standards, and packed with tutorial videos, game design books, instructional DVDs, and enough learning materials to get you up and running in no time.

Co-Star in the game:\r\nGet \u2018really\u2019 into the game, by getting an avatar with your likeness, and featuring vocals provided by you, and get immortalized by playing your part in the story of Zombie Tower Shooter.

Zombie invasion on your town:\r\nWe will make 3 levels, featuring your designation of targets at your home town. Our production team will use actual locations and streets of your choosing, and we will design 3 unique levels, after which we will leave you all the data and resources to create more levels of your hometown. Your level will be free to you, but will be part of a map pack for sale to other players, and you will be given royalties each time your levels sell.

Full size arcade with weapon controller:\r\nJust like it says, a large scale arcade featuring three screens running in unison together, complete with fully functional controller shaped like a weapon from the game, customized with some gun bling from our studio.
